channel.title: Credit systems - Possible duping?
channel.description:
Well on my server i have made a Credit system which is like money.
As it is a pickup server i made the credit system and ways to earn the credits that you need to buy a few selected items.
But recently i've heard that a lot of people on my server have been duping them.
Now these credits are not in item form, but the way you use them basically is like a banking card.
You can spend them when ever you need without needing to take things out of your bank.
So can you guys help me figure out how to dupe them?

item.title: Credit systems - Possible duping?
item.dc:creator: @zachrida zachrida
item.description:
@zachrida wrote:

ok[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2009, 06:30:36 pm[/size][hr]you have to dl teamviewer becaus ei cant go on webclient on your website it takes no memory

item.title: Credit systems - Possible duping?
item.dc:creator: @Chaostheory Chaostheory
item.description:
@Chaostheory wrote:

I don’t but if you wan’t to take a look at the system then go to www.projectcatastrophe.com and use the webclient and once you log in type in ::credits to find out about the system in place.

Read full topic
